name: Whale Watching
description: Explore the deep sea wild life on a whale watching adventure! Spend five hours on the sea and enjoy a fantastic meal on the boat

name: Parasailing
description: Fly above the sea and have an experience you will never foret. You can fly in tandem or solo and parasailing is safe for all ages.

name: Zip Line Tour
description: Soar above the breathtaking landscapes of the island and get the best view of all the scenery. Your tour guides will make sure no site is missed.

name: Luau
description: Tropical gardens, tiki torches and a superb buffet-style meal create the perfect setting for this authentic three-hour experience

name: Snorkling
description: Get a delicous breakfast on your way to one of the most populated reefs on the island. Schools of fish as far as the eye can see!

name: Helicopter Tour
description: Get a birds eye view of the whole island with an ariel tour. So long as you aren't afraid of heights this will be an experience like no other.

name: Kayaking
description: Travel the island water on a kayak shared either with a party member or a guide. Your sure to get a good exercise.

name: Scuba Diving
description: Dive deep into the sea to get a look at the marine life that most sea farers can only dream of. The dive will take place in an environment heavily populated by sea turtles.

name: Surfing
description: New to surfing? Rent a surf board along with some surfing lesson to get take you sea adventures to a whole new level.

name: Horseback Riding
description: Take a relaxing ride on the back of a horse along the beautiful island coastline. You may also opt to ride through exquisite valleys.

name: Golfing
description: Wish you could gold but didnt bring the right equipment? No worries just rent a full set from the resort and you are ready to get on the course.

name: Cave Tour
description: If exploring the unknown is your thing then the our local cave tour is the activity for you. Our guide will take you a mile deep into the island.

name: Volcano Tour
description: Explore our island signature wonder of the world. Engaging in this volcano tour would leave you speachless.

name: Waterfall Hike
description: Nothing parallels the beauty of our natural waterfalls. Take a engaging hike up to our tallest waterfall.

name: Jet Skiing
description: Explore the island shore in style on a jet ski. Our resort offers rentable jet ski along with comlementary lesson.

name: Paddle Boarding
description: Get the feeling of walking on water and paddle board in the island waters. This activity will test your balance and athletic abilities.

name: Sail boat excursion
description: Take a relaxing ride on a sail boat and let the sea breaze fill your youngs. This activity is the rest and relaxation you need.

name: Deep Sea Fishing
description: Revolutionize your fishing experience by deep sea fishing with expert trained fishermen.

name: ATV Tour
description: Cover lots of land and see many attractions with the atv tour. Fun for the whole family.

name: Wine Tour
description: Get a guided exploration of our local vineyard and taste an array of wines.

name: Theatre Performance
description: Reserve your seats for the next showing of our island performers. You will be treated to musical story to sit back and relax to.
